name: viceroyal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a viceroy (= a ruler representing a king or queen, ruling for them in another country): Records show that payments were made to the entire viceroyal household and army. The vice-royal representative repeated the request.
More examplesFewer examplesOne of the viceroyal council members claimed that there was a precedent for the proposed measures.This was a formal viceroyal document, permitting people to explore and exploit the land.During the viceroyal period, the region was not only neglected, but suffered years of economic exploitation.
